CustomField.formula: "Patient: " & Opportunity.Account.AccountNumber &" , " & Opportunity.Account.Name &" , " & Opportunity.Account.BillingStreet &" , " & Opportunity.Account.BillingCity &" , " & Opportunity.Account.BillingPostalCode &" , " & Opportunity.Account.BillingState &" , Insurance Number: " & Opportunity.Benefit__r.Authorization_Number__c &" , Supply Period From: " & TEXT ( Opportunity.Benefit__r.Auth_Start_Date__c) &" to " & TEXT ( Opportunity.Benefit__r.Auth_End_Date__c)
CustomField.label: Patient Details
